description_html:
Cila is the result of a holistic approach to contemporary living and working environments. The fluid form of Cila was inspired by the image of layers of cloth enveloping the body. Its silhouette of smooth lines retains a graphic character from its distinctive curve––the most essential symbol of shelter.

Cila is a multipurpose seating design that complements existing Arper products and can be customized to seamlessly integrate into a variety of aesthetics. Cila is an optimal guest seating for hotel rooms, cafeterias, restaurants, meeting spaces, home offices, and anywhere comfort, protection and concentration is desired.
Comfortable yet lightweight, Cila’s plastic shell can be customized in six colors with optional seat cushions or fully upholstered in a range of textures, colors, and styles. Base and leg options include 4 metal legs, 4 wooden legs, a metal sled or a trestle base.
